uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.remote.xml

Class XPackageSerialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.remote.xml.XPackageSerialiser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XRequestVocab, XResponseVocab

    public abstract class XPackageSerialiser
extends java.lang.Object
implements XRequestVocab, XResponseVocab
    XML-based serialiser used by the MEKON remote access mechanisms. This is an abstract class with separate client and server specific extensions for both parsing and rendering.

    • Nested Class Summary
